name: Neuro-Siphon
description: A subdermal neural implant that siphons psychic energy from the user's surroundings and converts it into raw power. Prolonged use can lead to debilitating headaches.

flavor.rationale: Developed as a means for corporate security forces to enhance their combat capabilities, the Neuro-Siphon is now a black market item sought after by both augmented street thugs and those seeking an edge in psychic warfare.
